price: 24. Ma ku dhadhaminayaan dhexdeeda wax qabow ah iyo cabbitaan midna.
arabic: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرۡدٗا وَلَا شَرَابًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lā yadhūqūna fīhā bardan walā sharāban
